channel.title: Can i edit somones client so it logs onto my server?
channel.description: can i edit somones client so it logs onto my server?

item.title: Can i edit somones client so it logs onto my server?
item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx
item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

well if your server requires a certain UID then go into signlink and change it to match what you have in your server.

Read full topic
item.source: Can i edit somones client so it logs onto my server?

item.title: Can i edit somones client so it logs onto my server?
item.dc:creator: @laxboy laxboy
item.description:
@laxboy wrote:

yes you can some clients are diffrent but usually you can find the server that is set to log into in the client file

search for

43594

you should see

{ anInt957 = 0; anInt958 = 0; method52(true); aBoolean959 = true; signlink.storeid = 32; signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getLocalHost()); setserver("gavinscape.no-ip.biz", "43594"); method2(503, false, 765); }
were it says set server change that to your ip

Read full topic
